page.title: 09BIRD CLUB
page.content: BIRD CLUB _________ We have a bird club at school that meets every wednesday at 3.30p.m.MRS Owens and MR Oliver take charge of the club and we go out bird spotting as often as we can.There are 12 members and we pay 60p to join as group members of the Young Ornithologist Club.We get a magazine called "BIRD LIFE"from the R.S.P.B. We have erected a bird table in the school garden and also made a pond for them to drink and bathe.We make a note of any birds we see and are given talks by other people who are interested in birds.We have placed some nest boxes in the trees surrounding our garden and we hope a blue tit family will use it one day.
